website_summaries.verdict: Best wet-install protector for Samsung Galaxy 9.
pros: Overnight squeegee application process makes for strong protection
Sharp cutouts for cameras, volume control and other features
Earns bonus points for bubble-free appearance
cons: Not the easiest model to apply
For best results, watch the installation video

customer_reviews.title: Came just thrown in the box so the screen cover ...
customer_reviews.text: Came just thrown in the box so the screen cover was stuck to the paper inside and is unusable. Also only got 1 screen protector, not the 2 advertised. The pic is how it came.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Justak

customer_reviews.title: Pretty subpar. The installation and look/feel of it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty subpar. The installation and look/feel of it is pretty good but it picks up scratches with minimal pressure. Pressing a fingernail against it will cause an indentation that doesn't impair using the phone, but if you hold the phone at an angle you'll see all the imperfections in the glare. For the price I guess it's ok? They give you two so I'l probably be using this for the next several months but for my next screen protector i'd rather upgrade to something with glass. If you're low maintenance and don't care that it has weird indentations this case is actually perfect for you. Just to note, these aren't big scratches that cause warping of color or anything.
customer_reviews.author: katie Yu

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This product was extremely difficult to install, as there are [unnecessary] notches across the top that make it difficult to align. After using this for a couple days, I noticed I am having to clean the screen entirely too much and way too often. This protector collects and memorizes every touch, any drop of liquid, or scratch. It requires frequent cleaning throughout the day, and even fingerprints require windex or a cleaning solvent to remove them. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Nettles

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Just put it in and it took 30 mins to apply. Wasted the first screen cover because the application is so difficult. If the screen continues to look grainy in the morning I will be demanding a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good thing it came with 2 Protectors. Installation tools included!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its great that it came with 2. I automatically assumed this was tempered glass, and boy i was wrong. I installed the 1st protector and it was relatively easy. Came out perfect with no bubbles. The tools it came with made it easy to install. BUT since the S9 was fairy new, I bought a tempered glass because I am very clumsy with my phone. Turns out the tempered glass protector i bought did not fit on my phone perfectly; what a waste of money. Good thing I had an extra one from this product. I installed my 2nd protector, again, with ease.I would recommend this product. :)
customer_reviews.author: BigTangTheory

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this, and I am already in love. This screen protector fits perfectly and is easily installed. The package includes two screen protectors, a sticker to remove the debris from your phone, a large microfiber cloth, a rubber squeegee, and the solution. As a bonus, there is also a note included in the package that says if you messed up the installation they would send you a free replacement. What a great company! If you found this review helpful, please click the “helpful” button. If this is not helpful, please comment on it so I can improve my future reviews. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos&Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this screen protector because I have tried two different brands for the glass protectors and both have fallen off within a month. This screen protector was easy to apply. I followed other recommendations regarding getting the edges to stick - waiting over 30 minutes to push them down - and this did the trick. Unfortunately, in that time, a little dust got under the exposed edges. It feels nice to the touch!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love these and I've dropped my phone several times without cracking my screen. These are great and you don't get scratches or a glare like you do with the rigid ones. My husband insisted on using the rigid screen protectors and has gone through 4 in 2 years, the last one when his phone fell off of the bed onto the carpet and the protector cracked! I've had this one on my phone for 2 years with no issues, so he finally switched six months ago and has had no problems since. It's not a super thin plastic, it almost feels like a vinyl. It's also easy to install (a lot easier that the rigid ones)
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Fit really nicely, no tackiness, installed easily.
customer_reviews.text: Wow - honestly, after trying a bunch of tempered glass protectors I was starting to think I'd have to go without for my new phone. This was NOT difficult to install. The directions were clear and the video was very helpful. I'm not sure how long it will last, but the fit was perfect, and the texture is almost non-existent. I can barely tell there is a protector on there. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit
customer_reviews.text: This fits like a 2 dollar tshirt that was left in the dryer on high heat for 10 hours. It is labeled for s9 plus, but it is not even close. Too short and narrow, plus the notches on the top of the screen protector do not align to anything. If you want a small bottle of cleaning solution and a lint free cloth without an actual screen protector it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: John Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Bubble Free If You Follow Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Color me shocked! On the one hand, it was easy enough to install (the YouTube video was helpful), but I was initially upset at how many air bubbles there were despite following the instructions verbatim. I thought for sure that I would have to end up ripping the thing off and trying it again with the second one (and thinking, "It's a good thing they send two!"). But I waited a few days for the air bubbles to leave--just as they suggest--and amazingly, they're all gone! I'm actually impressed with the screen. No yellowing, no bubbles, and I feel pretty confident that it will protect my screen should anything happen.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase from this company
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't what i expected its just like putting a piece of paper on your phone definitely waste of money and does not go onto your phone without lots of bubbles this is my opinion and review on it I used both of them the first one had a little tear and would not go on right and the second one I tried to put on and would not seal without bubbles and the sides stick up it is definitely worth the money to get one from Zagg which is from Verizon and they are 50 and is a lot thicker than this one. Hope everyone finds this helpful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but Squeegee liquid towards curve edges!
customer_reviews.text: If you install this on a samsumg with curved screen make sure to pull liquid towards the edges as you first squeezee it out from under plastic, i had to spray more on sides as i tried to grt the sides to stick down. The positive is its WAY better than the glass/w liquid under screen savers becasue there is a little flex, so it doesnt peel up, the bad is im sure it is less protective, but its a great middle ground to protect against scrarches, and still have full sensitivity on thr screen (have also tried the plastic/glass covers that just stick at top and bottom, those suck..ha So overall, very happy so far w product!!
customer_reviews.author: patrick Craig

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the worst screen protector I've ever used. Install was pretty straight forward but the orange peel and impossible to clean plastic make this not worth it even for this price point. It takes a high quality micro fiber cloth 4+ wipes to remove a single finger print from the screen
customer_reviews.author: Nemo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: After going through 5 glass screen protectors falling off my phone I was DONE! No matter how I installed it or what case I used all the glass screen protectors fell off my phone! Then I came across IQ shield LiquidSkin, I love this screen protector SO MUCH!!! I've had it on my phone for 3 months now and none of the edges have come up and it's still adhered perfectly to my phone! My mom was having the same issues I was so I installed the 2nd screen protector that comes in the box onto her phone, she loves it! I would recommend this product to everyone! Especially people with curved screens!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed. Put it on the phone on Tuesday and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed. Put it on the phone on Tuesday and on Thursday when I took the phone out of my pocket the screen protector had stuck to a piece of paper in the pocket, causing the screen protector to peel off an inch. I'll need to replace it when I get home. In all previous uses of products like this the protector bonded with the screen pretty much permanently from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Bwater Evan

customer_reviews.title: Pointless junk. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is unused in my house still. In order to apply it you have to not use your phone for a really long time. I watched the videos and you basically have to soak your phone in a solution and then let dry for 12 hours. Who has time for that ? Plus they say how they stand by their product but they dont, because they will only replace the stupid screen saver if your phone breaks not your phone. Total waste of money. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Have used them for all my phones and smart watches. This one isn't quite right on sizing ...
customer_reviews.text: Was the most difficult shield to apply that I have ever ordered from IQ shield. Have used them for all my phones and smart watches. This one isn't quite right on sizing and bubbles took weeks to complete disappear. Doesn't wrap well around the curved edges of phone so it is peeling up in one corner. Perhaps if the sizing was larger to fit the screen more accurately then it would stick to the curved edges better.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla S

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is that it does scratch and ding easily. Mine already has a gouge in the protector ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this brand in the past for the S7 and it seemed to work well. Installation is always a pain, but it wasn't too hard given this was my first time with trying to install a protector on a curved edge screen. My only complaint is that it does scratch and ding easily. Mine already has a gouge in the protector and I'm not even sure how that happened.
customer_reviews.author: JLovesBooks

customer_reviews.title: Good screen
customer_reviews.text: I have used IQ shields for other devices and they work really well. They are a soft cover so they work well with devices that have curved edges. I am not sure how well it would protect against impact for a phone that is dropped or stepped on, but it will protect against scratches. Be sure you are ordering the right size. I have an S9 phone and accidentally ordered the screen protector for the S9 plus. Because it wasn't really worth the cost to send it back I cut it down to fit my screen. But that was my own fault and does not reflect on IQ shield.
customer_reviews.author: JAF

customer_reviews.title: Amazing screen protector!
customer_reviews.text: So hard going through reviews, so many negative. Finally decided on this and it's great! Installed 5 months ago and it's still almost perfect. Only problem I had was when I was when I was sweating with the phone in my pocket. Moisture caused one side to come loose. Pressed it back down and let it sit, can't even tell minus some lint on the edge. Follow the install instruction and let it sit, if sides start to come up just press them back down till they adhere. Phone will probably die before I use both screen protectors, but I'll buy this again if I need more!
customer_reviews.author: Erich Smith

customer_reviews.title: Edges will not adhere to the screen
customer_reviews.text: I've used other IQ Shield screen protectors in the past. However this curved edge application did not seem to work too well... After 2 days of constantly pushing the edges down, I've given up as it will not adhere properly. We're not talking about just a corner not sticking due to dust or poor cleaning. The issue runs along both edges from top to bottom. =(
customer_reviews.author: Victor Tham

customer_reviews.title: Worst product.
customer_reviews.text: This was the absolute worse purchase i have ever made. The protector makes my phone screen look greasy and gross no matter the amount of precision and patience it took to put it on in the first place. No matter how clean my phone was. The squeegee managed to smear the protector which was impossible to get clean. Used the solution and it didn't work. Tried to apply the protector a dozen times and continues to blur my screen and the bubbles will always be there. No matter how careful i put it on. I hate this product and ended up crumbling it and throwing it away because i was unable to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: DoN't WASTE YOUR MONEY & TIME !
customer_reviews.text: Have to spray exact amount liquid that come with in order to get it right. even so then, there could be leftover watermark or debris make your phone look ugly. If too little spray, yoour phone will be left with bubbles hard to push it off. It is soft cover and edges doesn't hold well. At least the products I received is not exact Cut for the samsung galaxy s9 plus because there is still gap space between phone edges and cover. Terrible buy!
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Durable, Clear, Can't be beat for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the screen protectors that came with our phone cases. My wife also has this on her tablet. It is much more clear than our last screen protectors and can't be beat especially for the price. I did run out of the spray while installing the second screen protector, but you can just refill it with water if you need to (although I didn't know that until I was already done.) It is still curing, but already more clear and responsive than our lest protectors. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I read the instructions, and it worked great
customer_reviews.text: It did take me more time that I hoped, but that is because I actually read the instructions carefully and did exactly what it said to do, but it was worth it. I'm very happy with and I think I like it better than a glass protector. The last glass protector I had on a phone was okay, but it took a little bit more pressure to respond. This screen protector is very responsive to touch so I'm happy I took my time and installed it right.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector
customer_reviews.text: My s9+ got a scratch within days. After searching for tempered glass, none of them seem to do a good job with the curved screen. This new version of iq shield is super transparent and smooth to the touch. I recommend it to protect your screen. I had their old version on my gs7and it protected it well. A plus, after I installed it, all scratches on the glass blended in. I recommend replacing couple months of use. This pack brings 2. Another thi g I like is that it gives the screen a little bit of tackiness when thumb typing, the glass screen is way too smooth. Just follow installation instructions on their website.
customer_reviews.author: V. Acuna

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've never meet a screen shield that was easy to apply, but this is the best so far. It's forgiving and the package comes with two so if you totally mess it up you get a second chance. Instructions were clear and easy to follow. Definitely not anti glare but it is durable and over a year later not a single scratch on my phone. It doesnt mess with my touch screen capabilities either. I will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Krise

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and great!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Galaxy S9 screen protector today and let me just say I'm so glad I didn't purchase one from Verizon. This one has a much better price and is just as good and probably even better. It was very easy to put on and fit perfectly. I liked using the solution that came with it I think the protector actually stuck much better than previous protectors that I had purchased for my old phone. You won't go wrong with this product!
customer_reviews.author: LesleeG

customer_reviews.title: Tried to get replacement, no response
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this IQ shield for our Samsung Galaxy S9+ smartphones. One of the two phones had the screen protector come off. As you indicate, you offer a "lifetime replacement". I tried emailing you twice, and of course, no response. All I'm looking for is a replacement for my husband's smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: No bubbles and easy install
customer_reviews.text: I ALWAYS buy a screen protector any time I purchase a new phone as I'm the worst for scratches due to just dropping into my purse. This is the first time I've purchased this brand and LOVE it. It went on so easy and the first one I've every purchased that didn't bubble up. Was so smooth I was shocked. The durability of this screen protector is amazing and love the fact it has self-healing properties. It's transparent so makes seeing my screen so much better and easy on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Blueskys

customer_reviews.title: It's a soft plastic film that covers and protects your screen and you get 2 covers!!
customer_reviews.text: I like how this IS NOT a hard surfaced screen protector. My fingers glide perfectly on the surface of my phone screen and there's no cloudy effects or air bubbles on the screen after applying this. It fells more like a film on my screen kind of like those soft plastic window clings. My husband bought a hard plastic screen protector for his phone, but he wasn't happy when the screen wouldn't sense his finger on the screen. He bought an IQ Shield for his Note 8 and he loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa estrada

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy install
customer_reviews.text: If you watch the video and follow the directions, the install is easy. I installed this at night before bed and was able to get the edges to adhere. No bubbles, and can barely tell that I'm using a screen protector. There is a tiny bit of resistsance when swiping, but I believe this is due to the material the protector is made out of (and that causes small scratches to mold back together).
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Is pretty nice I first used in on my S7 Edge ...
customer_reviews.text: Is pretty nice I first used in on my S7 Edge a phone for over a year what's wrong with the order this time was one of them decided to completely wrap up but when I notify I want it did set me a brand new one and I did not even ask for them to send me one they just sent it I got it I was surprised
customer_reviews.author: amber prosser

customer_reviews.title: Take your time
customer_reviews.text: The key to getting this screen protector put on your phone correctly is to cut it before you try to place it. You also need to be patient once the screen protector is in place. I was impatient with the first one and it didn't get installed very well. I took my time with the second one, cut it first then put it on the phone and did not touch the phone overnight. Much better second time around and I'm about to buy this screen protector again.
customer_reviews.author: Tinashe Banza

customer_reviews.title: Awesome💪
customer_reviews.text: It been on my galaxy 9S+for 1 year and still perfect. my phone was on the floor and someone put an office chair on top of it and it made a 3/4 inch gash and thought I would have to buy a new one, when I woke up in the next morning the screen was totally healed and you could not see any damage. Another time sitting in the heat the size of the screen it got a heat bubble and lifted off, that totally healed and there's not a visible signs, this is an amazing screen protector!💪
customer_reviews.author: Barry and Alfie

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I applied it as shown in the video and everything worked out great. I feel like there is no screen protector at all. At first, there was some scratches right after installation, and I was about to remove it and re try the second one. After a few hours, the scratches gone and I realized the self-healing effect of this screen protector. Hint, for the edges, it kept popping up. I used the hair dryer to apply a little bit heat at the edges and it sticked like magic.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy T.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, however there are imperfections on the protector even prior to install
customer_reviews.text: There are imperfections on the IQ Shield LiquidSkin S9+ screen protector even before installation. But it does offer superior protection for the screen against scratches, it's a similar material as used in the original ZAGG screen protectors, but the thickness of this screen protector seems to be thinner than ZAGG. Installation requires additional 10-15 min time for the liquid to dry out under the protector in order to get the curved edge area installed properly.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAholic

customer_reviews.title: NOT made for all cases, Otterbox Defender S9+
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, nice looking once it's on and good protection. I'm only giving 2 stars because this screen protector has made me very upset in conjunction with my case. If the protector was .0000001 wider on any side there would not be any issue with my Otterbox Defender plastic outline. But trying to slip on the plastic sleeve, the thin edge taps the protector and creates bubbles no matter how you try it. I've gotten it completely on, and then the protector bubbles from stress points. Why give me 2 screen protectors when you could've just made it wrap my phone entirely and saved my anger?
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Swope

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: I've only just put it on my phone so I can't say whether or not it will protect the phone but I can say this was the EASIEST inatallation of a screen protector I've ever had! The bubbles were immediately gone after a good squeegee and it didn't leave any streaks or anything. Exceeded expectations! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: FILM not very protective
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a glass screen protector for my new phone and I had searched glass screen protector. I didn't notice the word film within the description but thought it was added for searching. This is definitely very very thin. I'm not really sure how this could protect a phone from dropping but possibly from makeup or something very simple like that. I'm sure it's fine quality but not what should come up in the search.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney loves Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of IQ Shield products, but this one falls short... literally!
customer_reviews.text: This product highlights that it can be used with a case, however, I find that it is a couple of millimeters too short. The bottom of the protector collides with the case, instead of going under the case, so it keeps bubbling and peeling up. I would recommend lining from the bottom first, instead of lining the indentations at the top below the speaker and camera. If I had another shield, that's the method I would try. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and self healing!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these liquid skins for years on my cell phones. I once used glass for everything thinking it was Superior but every time the phone was bumped or twisted a tiny bit the glass was cracked. I started using liquid skin because of this. If you get a little scuff or scrape on the screen within a few hours it is magically gone. Take your time while putting it on and you will have no bubbles or imperfections. I will remain a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly! I’m always hesitant to buy electronics online but this accessory was well priced and it looks like good quality. I was scared to mess it up but the instructions were clear and it was easy to put it on my phone. Totally worth it and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gem Trinity

customer_reviews.title: I am super impressed with the packaging and contents
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am super impressed with the packaging and contents. Comes with EVERYTHING you need for application, AS WELL AS an instruction card with links to a YOUTUBE video showing step-by-step application. You can't possibly mess this up! The quality of the film exceeded my expectations. I ordered something similar for my S8+ from another company and it wasn't nearly as good as this. You get everything you need. You will NOT be disappointed! 👍
customer_reviews.author: StaciLynn (u/Lynnicats)

customer_reviews.title: Surprised me
customer_reviews.text: I watched the video and it helps but I've put shields on before. One of the surprises was how many times I was able to realign the film until I got it where I wanted it. Most film shields would have been ruined but this one didn't care. When I did get it lined up there were no bubbles or streaks. I did let it sit over night and was able to put the case on without disturbing the film. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Gray

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Includes 2 screen protectors, however, I'm not impressed by the quality. I applied the first sheet without issues, BUT there was a small piece of plastic from the sheet itself (probably from how it was cut out) that got underneath and I could not remove it. The second sheet has a defect in the plastic near one corner. Its manageable, but also quite noticeable in certain situations.
customer_reviews.author: M. VanNatta

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job, but as for case friendly?  Ehhhh.
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, it works great as a screen protector. I use a Spigen case though and the protector butts right up against the case, so when the case moves even the slightest, it starts pulling up the protector from the sides. It's not been a huge issue because I'm not that picky, but I could see how it would really annoy some people with OCD.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Just bad
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not following the application process that's provided, but product is still really soft, my nail alonr dents and scratches it without resistance. Unless you know what you're getting into/have bough similar products, I reccomend a normal plastic protector or tempered glass over this.
customer_reviews.author: revelation

customer_reviews.title: IQ Shield screen protectors are the best I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: IQ Shield screen protectors are the best I've ever used. They are easy to apply. They don't start to curl up on the edges either. I've got them for my S7 (non edge version), S8, and S9 Plus. I am going to be getting a set for my wife's Fitbit charge 2 soon as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  I've had it for a year with no issues
customer_reviews.text: I tried several different glass covers, but they were worthless. This provides an extra layer over the screen that resists scratching. The glass covers came off easily and are difficult to type on. This cover reacts just like you are typing directly on the screen. I am very pleased with this purchase and at a very affordable rate.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Z

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protection!
customer_reviews.text: Since we've had this screen protector, we've had no problems within the last 3-4 months. It especially conforms to the Otterbox for the S9 Plus. No bubbling and tearing. I do recommend though that if you are not steady handed and cannot work fast, you should let an electronics store and Best Buy Geek install it for you for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Dotty H

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The first one fell off inside my pocket, because it is just held in place by double face tape. The 2nd one cracked within a month. I guess it did protect my phone, but it should be able to last longer than a month. Been running no protector for the last few months and my phone has been fine by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Josh318

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit, and does not self seal
customer_reviews.text: The package says air bubbles will go away, and many of them do. But it has been 3 months now and i've half a dozen large bubbles, and similar number small bubbles. it is not an exact fit for my phone, and it looks a bit silly as there are cut outs around the periphery for things like charger port, headphones, that are fully on the face of my phone rather than the sides. none of the edges of the cover go to any edge of my phones surface.
customer_reviews.author: Ward Campbelli

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: 2 cracked protective covers and one broke screen... I applied the screen protector just as it instructed and within the month my husband had to have his phone replaced after falling maybe 4 inches. And I woke up this morning to a crack in my screen protector, so I just don't recommend it at all, oh an if you're outside in any kind of heat the "protector" will slide around your screen
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Ward

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Over time, though, it shifts. The edges keep peeling up because it wouldn't stsy under the phone case. Each time it peels on the edges due to the shift, it collects dust and after awhile there will be too much dust and it won't stick. However that is also due to the type of case I was using too, probably. One thing I love is the bubbles disappear on their own within a couple days like the directions say. I've had and used it for over 3 months and it's pretty good on scratch resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Deena Her Vang

customer_reviews.title: Watch the instructions. Great coverage and works with case.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to watch the direction video first. Botched it with the first one, but did it right with the second. Now that it is on, I love it. Works well with my case as well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Watch the videos
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get it to work at first but you really do need to watch the videos honestly to get it right. With the videos help, it worked like a charm. Amazing protector. And awesome customer service. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Difficult install.  Better options available.
customer_reviews.text: The install leaves alot of room for error, any small mistake results in bubbles and imperfections. And it has to sit overnight to dry. After a few weeks I had to throw it away because it was peeling off. I purchased a black web screen protector at walmart for like $16. It installed quickly and easily, much better than this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Mcquillan

customer_reviews.title: Was my least favorite screen protector of all time
customer_reviews.text: The film is a thin poly type wrap/ film. You spray on a solution and slide the film into place. Seemed like it was worth a try. It was not. If these are your go to protectors, so be it. I wont ever purchase another of this type.
customer_reviews.author: Lawmann1

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt buy or use anything else
customer_reviews.text: I use IQ sheilds for all my devices. My longest was my tablet. Lasted 2 years till i dropped it and gouged the protector. Customer service replaced the sheild, hassle free and no damage to my screen. As long as you follow directions goes on perfect. Longest lasting and best looking. I love the product and the company!!
customer_reviews.author: hunterskeeper

customer_reviews.title: IQ Shield is My To-GO Screen Protector!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE their products!! So far I had purchased their screen protectors for my Samsung Galaxy phones (S4/S7edge/S8+/S9/S9+) and it is one of the BEST products out there!! The installation, most likely for the first-timers, will be a bit tricky but they send you TWO for that reason. ALSO, if the screen protector does get damaged after the 2nd one, they will even send you a REPLACEMENT FREE (minus shipping) - FOR LIFE!! That's a pretty good warranty, I've taken advantage only once so far and NO HASSLE, easy communication. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: ubertechinsiders

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect for my moms phone
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand for my phones and I love it! Worked for my mom and she loves it as well. Easy to apply, bubbles disappear, scratches are non existent. Also comes with a squeegee and applicator spray. Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and took no time at all. I watched their installation video just to be sure it was similar to others and it was. The only thing I did different was that I didn't wait the recommended time (which I think is 24 hours).
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Brunson

customer_reviews.title: Different from what i usually apply.
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this since I'm returning a tempered glass protector. The only issue I have are applying the curves but after some time it stayed down. The texture feels like a shower curtain liner, which isn't a bad thing. Honestly, check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Easiest screen protector ever!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously! Buy this! It is the easiest screen protector I have ever had to put on my phone! No bubbles and it has protected my phone perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The film is thin and "alive"
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't too easy to install for the first time, but indeed, later within 1-2 days all bubbles got disappeared. However, the overall experience isn't perfect - the film is so thin that it doesn't create a smooth surface. It's is wrinkled and you can see it (but fortunately can't feel when touching the screen).
customer_reviews.author: Happy dad, NC

customer_reviews.title: Adheres Well
customer_reviews.text: It's a thick layer, so it's not as smooth as the glass when using it. And it is in NO way shape or form, SCRATCH RESISTANT lol. It holds all kinds of dents and scratches. But I'd rather buy something that I know will work for my curved screen. Follow the installation video online.
customer_reviews.author: Black Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Blurry/splotchy
customer_reviews.text: Very grainy looking and splotchy! It wasn't too bad putting it on but I had to go through both protectors in the pack to get it just right. I have used the liquid protecters 3 different times and never had a problem till this time. After the first one just didnt sit right and looked too blurry to see, I tried the second one. It is still really blurry but I am leaving it on till I can order a different one. I dont know if it is just this pack or the brand, but with so many positive reviews I thought I would give it a try. Hopefully the next one works better...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and defective
customer_reviews.text: Really doesn't work. One of the screen protectors was so stuck to the paper that it ripped as I was trying to remove it. I got the other one installed on my phone and it seemed to be working okay but it has already started separating from my phone at the corners after only three days of use. So I'm about to trash it and look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: tonytanksr

customer_reviews.title: No good for long term use
customer_reviews.text: Had this screen protector on for 26 days. It held on very good, no pealing around the edges. It's not that difficult to install. I took it off due to markings all over the screen protector. No matter how careful I was. I am now taking a chance with Dome Glass. I honestly don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this brand. But lately I have been getting bad screen protectors. They come with little hairs trapped between the screen protector and the packaging it's in. They also don't seem to be sticking well up top where the button cutouts are. Really bummed out because these used to be my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Rae

customer_reviews.title: Only.option for curved screen on galaxy
customer_reviews.text: It is the only screen cover that stays on with the galaxy curved screen. I have used 4 of these due to drops and other things that would destroy any cover. I still like them and will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first but looks great and easy to put on!
customer_reviews.text: This went on rough with lots of bubbles but after a few days is perfect. I don't know how the technology works but all the bubbles go away in about 4 days or so. Glad I didn't send this back!
customer_reviews.author: Randy bo Bandy

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles all over and a pain to install
customer_reviews.text: Watched the video for install. What a pain in the butt. The screen protector for the S9 plus is a thin film. My fault in buying it and not looking at material, but this is not the glass the product needs. Theres no way this thin film is going to protect the original screen. Also, if you enjoy bubbles, you'll love this screen protector. I've now had three screen protectors. This one is by far the worst of them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these on my S7 and it worked great, so I got it for my S9+ and so far so good. The install went fine, I just followed the video instructions and it is sitting on my phone perfectly. I have not had any issues with the curved screen like others have noted. I just pressed them down like the video showed and now they are set. It even works with my Diztronic TPU phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Hagge

customer_reviews.title: Great For Cases!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for quite some time! They are super easy to install and work well to keep my screen from getting scratched! I've had them for forever and I still haven't used them all because they last so long! They are not shatter protection from dropping your phone as they are thin but other than that, they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with IQ
customer_reviews.text: Been using IQ since I had my S7. They are great and the lifetime warranty works awesome only pay 1 cent for a new pack. IQ is my go to screen protector. I used it on my Galaxy Gear 2 and pretty much on anything with the screen they make protectors for.
customer_reviews.author: Cruz

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't protect
customer_reviews.text: This cover didn't protect my husband's phone. It doesn't cover the WHOLE screen, therefore when it fell and the screen cracked twice on the side. The screen is now blinking white on 3/4 of the screen. Its a $950 phone, 4 month old Samsung galaxy s9+ How do I get a compensation?
customer_reviews.author: Meemo

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Although the application is a bit involved compared to just sticking on a screen protector, I think it's worth it because you can really make sure there are no bubbles or anything else under the screen. It comes with 2 screen protectors so you can either have a replacement ready or a redo if you mess up the first time. I like how this screen protector feels better than no protector. It's more smooth but not slippery at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen N

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product and company
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Product and company, would highly recommend this screen protector. I was a little intimidated by the install process, but it is far easier than it sounds. Just make sure there is absolutely no dust/particals because like all screen protectors it will stay trapped under there and bother you until you take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: take your time and follow the directions :)
customer_reviews.text: if you take your time and go slow and get the bubbles out and give your phone the time needed to finish it works perfectly! dont rush it! (you have to leave your phone alone for 12 hours)
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA

customer_reviews.title: Easy, trouble free installation
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, if you make a mistake, easy to restart the installation process and correct your mistake. Much superior to zagg one and done installation products. But be certain to adjust the touch sensitivity of your phone to its most sensitive setting because the covering is tough and hard and makes the screen less sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install in one go.
customer_reviews.text: While the installation process was a bit difficult, the screen itself has held up for the first year of owning this phone. It has a surprising amount of protection against drops. Unlike other vinyl screen protectors this one does not get snagged on sharp objects and tear or become bubbled easily. The most impressive part is its ability to keep the edges adhered to the edges of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Abbot

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: They can be a little tricky to get just right at times but it's easy to adjust. Mine usually last me awhile. I have noticed with some cases if you dont get the protector on just right it will peel up in places but overall I love these protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Adkins

customer_reviews.title: dont let all the steps in the directions keep you from buying this
customer_reviews.text: after buying and returning countless glass screen covers for my s9+, using bad cases with built in (easliy scratched) screen protectors and going comando thinking that the gorilla glass would be ok and not get scratched. i finally turned to this ... went on very easily and so far has held up great. i would highly recomend this. :)
customer_reviews.author: DINGO

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service response, case friendly, does not cover entire screen edge to edge.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, just watch the video. When installing noticed holes didn't line up on top and it did not cover the entire screen edge to edge. After contacting customer service, I was advised this was the case friendly version. There is a 2nd version for the edge to edge protector. I didn't see this in the description so we'll see if it fits. Otherwise, seems like an ok screen protector and would probably fist S9 better than S9+. I'll wait for the replacement screen to come and update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Air

customer_reviews.title: it's a thinnest sheet like a lamination paper
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, it's a thinnest sheet like a lamination paper, no protection to screen
customer_reviews.author: M_kaur

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the shiney covers, too much glare. Not a problem withe this vendor but just the shiney covers. Other than that, this is an awesome screen cover. Easy to install, self healing and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Virtual Troy

customer_reviews.title: Best screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I could not wait for this to arrive. This screen protector is the best and I've tried many.It comes with a cleaning solution and cloth you use to make sure everything is clear.It was very easy to apply didn't leave bumps or creases like most screen protectors do. I really like this and will be buying again and telling friends with the same phone about it.
customer_reviews.author: Redd

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Protection
customer_reviews.text: Bubbles along edges. While it was slightly annoying, it wasn't a deal breaker as I just wanted my screen protected. Followed instructions for installation to the letter. The only thing this protects from is light scratching on the screen and I didn't realize that til today. As someone who babies their phone, not a huge deal. But somehow my phone falls off a 2ft night stand and now I have my first ever cracked phone screen. This "protector" even got a tear in it... Pretty let down.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: After trimming lower edge of Otter box frame it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install after watching several videos. I installed at night. 10 hours later it was perfect. I then placed it into an Otter box. Around 40 minutes later I noticed that the bottom edge began to bubble/lift. I took the phone out of the case around 6 times trying to get rid of the lifting. Even tried a thin strip of tape. Nothing worked. So, I used a file and box cutter to trim approximately 1/8 inch off the bottom edge of the hard plastic Ottr Box frame. Bingo! Problem solved. Yes!
customer_reviews.author: Prentis Uyeg

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my S9+ so cover up the previous scratches and protect the screen. The wet application was intimidating, but once I got the hang of it, it was actually much easier and not a single bubble!
customer_reviews.author: MeganMae

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Was token back when got it cause I was expecting a plastic shield. And all the bubbles on after first putting on. But these things are great. Had some drops and no damage to phone and none to shield. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Melissa King

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect, hardly know its there
customer_reviews.text: I installed this today. Watched You tube instruction video, Pretty straight forward. You wet the phone screen and shield with supplied cleaner and you have a few minutes to position and remove excess spray. Had no issues what so ever. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Will B.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best screen protector in the market.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly it a perfect product. I did not have any problem while installing it and no air bubbles. It so smooth you feel like your fingers are flying on it. I used another products before but I loved this one and it comes with easy installation manual that will help you a lot. I really recommend this product y'all.
customer_reviews.author: Murat SORUC

customer_reviews.title: Just wish it was full coverage
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and feels great(no reduction of touch sensitivity). However, I will not consider this as "full" coverage as it leaves screen quite a bit on top and bottom. Top edge is slightly annoying as you feel it everytime you want to pull your notification bar.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Park

customer_reviews.title: Best screen protector for S9+
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of trying 2 other brands before I bought this IQ Shield protector. This one is the best by far. Stays in place & doesn't easy get scratched. I have used IQ Shield brand in the past & they will be the first brand I look for next time I need a protector for a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put on!
customer_reviews.text: I am TERRIBLE at putting on screen protectors, but this thing is stupid easy to put on, and has almost magic protection. I'll never use any other brand for my phone's. Just do yourself a favor and watch their YouTube video on how to install it. Just Google IQ shield liquid protector install.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Auw

customer_reviews.title: Improper fit on my screen
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for me the one I got seemed to be cut in a very imprecise manner. The edges were off and now one side is longer than the other and it's beginning to bubble up.
customer_reviews.author: adriant91378

product_meta.title: IQ Shield Screen Protector Compatible with Galaxy S9 Plus (2-Pack)(Case Friendly) Anti-Bubble Clear Film
feature_bullets: The IQ Shield screen protector compatible with the Galaxy S9 Plus includes our proprietary screen protector, squeegee, cloth, and intuitive installation instructions
Innovative adhesive coupled with our unique application method ensures easy, bubble-less and frustration-less installation that will leave the film perfectly contoured to any device

Unlike other common screen protectors, IQ Shield protectors are crafted using a revolutionary process that combines high response accuracy, durability, non-yellowing and clear transparency into a single layer of flexible yet tough film
Classified as a “smart film” and transparent once applied, the IQ Shield seamlessly merges mobile protection and user interactivity into a single enjoyable experience
Every Screen Protector compatible with Galaxy S9 Plus is backed by our Lifetime Replacement Warranty and 100% Satisfaction Guarantee

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,003 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
